item.title: 3DGS-Enhancer: Enhancing Unbounded 3D Gaussian Splatting with View-consistent 2D Diffusion Priors
item.description: 3DGS-Enhancer boosts unbounded 3D Gaussian splatting, generating high-fidelity novel views even with sparse input data using view-consistent 2D diffusion priors.
